title: Is anarchism possible in the 21st century? - Quora

response.answer_text: Anarchism is certainly possible, it’s just unlikely given the current political climate. I think Anarchism in parts of Latin America would be most likely, but other than that I think Leftism will lean towards Marxism or perhaps even just Libertarian Socialism in general. There are some Libertarian-Socialist/Anarchist areas in Mexico, but they aren’t fully autonomous or sovereign yet.
